Generally, voice recognition software requires the user to go through sever=
al training phases with it before using it, so the software is able to reco=
gnize that particular users words (unless it is a VERY limited set of words=
).=A0 So with this kind of software, it would be hard to create an objectiv=
e training session to pull a voice sequence out of noise from a voice that =
it has never heard.=A0=A0 The software would make a lot of mistakes, and pe=
rhaps even be subject to paradolia, just like people.

      hello,

does anyone know of a system which can fix a voice=
 wave form out of the background noise e.g a ghost box combined with voice =
recogntion software so that EVP responses are automatically registered (on =
the screen) so that even if consiously the operator may miss audio response=
s due to the background noise the machine/PC audio sensitivity will not ?

=


all the best,



Derek
